item.title: What is wrong with my run in server.java?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“BORED, post:4, topic:176152”]well try this public void run() { // setup the listener try { shutdownClientHandler = false; clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1, null); misc.println("- ovnisle -"); misc.println(" .. Online!"); while(true) { java.net.Socket s = acceptSocketSafe(clientListener); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if(/*connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1")*/true) { if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing") || connectingHost.startsWith("server2")) { misc.println(connectingHost+": Checking if server still is online..."); } else { int Found = -1; for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) { if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) { Found = ConnectionCount[i]; break; } } if (Found < 3) { misc.println("Connection accepted from "+connectingHost+": "+s.getPort()+"."); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); } else { s.close(); } } } else { misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort()); s.close(); } } } catch(java.io.IOException ioe) { if(!shutdownClientHandler) { misc.println("Error: Unable to startup listener on "+serverlistenerPort+" - port already in use?"); } else { misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down."); } } }[/quote]

I added something in, I need what is there.

item.title: What is wrong with my run in server.java?
item.dc:creator: @BORED BORED
item.description:
@BORED wrote:

well try this public void run() { // setup the listener try { shutdownClientHandler = false; clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1, null); misc.println("- ovnisle -"); misc.println(" .. Online!"); while(true) { java.net.Socket s = acceptSocketSafe(clientListener); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if(/*connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1")*/true) { if (connectingHost.startsWith("computing") || connectingHost.startsWith("server2")) { misc.println(connectingHost+": Checking if server still is online..."); } else { int Found = -1; for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) { if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) { Found = ConnectionCount[i]; break; } } if (Found < 3) { misc.println("Connection accepted from "+connectingHost+": "+s.getPort()+"."); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); } else { s.close(); } } } else { misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort()); s.close(); } } } catch(java.io.IOException ioe) { if(!shutdownClientHandler) { misc.println("Error: Unable to startup listener on "+serverlistenerPort+" - port already in use?"); } else { misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down."); } } }

item.source: What is wrong with my run in server.java?

item.title: What is wrong with my run in server.java?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi, this is my run method in server.java:

public void run() { // setup the listener try { shutdownClientHandler = false; clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1, null); misc.println("- Pkmad -"); misc.println("NOW ONLINE!"); new CP().run(); while(true) { java.net.Socket s = acceptSocketSafe(clientListener); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if(/*connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1")*/true) { if (server.playerHandler.checkBannedIps() == true) { misc.println(connectingHost+" is ip banned"); s.close(); } else { int Found = -1; for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) { if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) { Found = ConnectionCount[i]; break; } } if (Found < 3) { misc.println("Connection accepted from "+connectingHost+": "+s.getPort()+"."); String connectingAddress = s.getInetAddress().getHostAddress(); // Hostnames are too long, lets use ips :) 
            if(clientListener != null)
            {
             if(!BanManager.BannedAddress(connectingAddress)) // Is ip banned? 
             {
              misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from "+connectingAddress+":"+s.getPort());
                 playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingAddress);
             }
             else
             {
                misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected from "+connectingAddress+":"+s.getPort());
               s.close(); // Ip is banned, lets simply refuse the connection                  
					} else {
						s.close();
					}
				} else {
				misc.println("ClientHandler: Rejected "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort());
				s.close();
			}
		}
	} catch(java.io.IOException ioe) {
		if(!shutdownClientHandler) {
			misc.println("Error: Unable to startup listener on "+serverlistenerPort+" - port already in use?");
		} else {
			misc.println("ClientHandler was shut down.");
		}
	}
}</blockquote>

This is the error I get:

server.java:203: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ server.java:211: 'catch' without 'try' } catch(java.io.IOException ioe) { ^ 2 errors Server Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Thanks alot.

Musicmad441

Read full topic
